actions.text: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Condit to the Pombo amendment (A019).
On agreeing to the Condit amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment to the Pombo amendment (A019) provides for a phase-out of the current H-2A temporary agricultural worker program should the pilot program established in the Pombo amendment become permanent. \   Amendment subsequently failed with the rejection of the Pombo amendment (A019).
purpose: An amendment to provide for a two-year phase-out of the current guest worker program established in the Pombo amendment should the pilot program become permanent.
